Night Hike at the Pennisula

February 09, 2020 | 0 Minute Read


Erie Outing Club Hike at the Pennisula at night time.

We started near the Lighthouse. It was wet in spots and we had to do some alternative trails.
The group picture is near the Maintenance Building. Ralph also join us, She is the dog.
The temperture was in the low 30â€™s with light snow. This was the first time I (webmaster) has done a Hike at night time down at the Pennisula.
